channel.title: Pking help! neede ASAP
channel.description: So my pking and fun pk and stuff you hit people and it shows hits but there hp stays the same? Btw its erasedpkz orignialy but anyone know what to do?

item.title: Pking help! neede ASAP
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Do you mean their Hitpoints stat stays the same? As in it says 99/99, or that their Hitpoints Bar doesn’t update? I don’t work with those types of bases, but you should make sure that your Hitpoints and Stat Update methods are done correctly. Also, you might try reducing another Stat to see if It’s limited to one Stat.

Read full topic
